column4: I'm surprised Ubuntu takes up so much memory... 116 MB while running only terminal
Well, I'm sure someone with this card and this kernel does... But yeah. :P
I guess it's a good habbit, I'm just so used to sitting on my computer for 5 hours at a time :P
I thought Linux would be a lot less stressful
My windows XP box runs about 80 megs
are you running the desktop enviroment though?
I'm just worrying about games and stuff
don't worry about it, when the system needs more memory it will clear some out
' use only what is needed, keep the rest for what is wanted alter'
